1001100000000000//LDI R0,0 (0)
1001100001000000//LDI R1,0 (1)
1001100010000101//LDI R2,5 (2)
1100000000001011//BRZ if(R1=0)PC+3 (3)
0000010001000001//ADD R1,R0,R1 (4)
0000001000000000//INC R0,R0 (5)
0000101011000010//SUB R3,R0,R2 (6)
1100001111011101//BRN if(R3<0)PC-3 (7)
1110000000101001//JMP PC=R5 (8)
